mapper.select: select * from charge where c_size = #{size} and c_area = #{area}
mapper.insert: Insert into WAYBILL values ( (select max(w_num)+1 from waybill), to_date(SYSDATE,'RR/MM/DD'), #{w_dtn}, #{m_num}, #{w_req}, #{sender_nm}, #{sender_tel}, #{sender_add}, #{receiver_nm}, #{receiver_tel}, #{receiver_add}, #{w_div}, #{w_weight}, #{n_start}, #{n_via}, #{n_end}, to_date(#{w_duedate},'RR/MM/DD'), #{c_num} )
mapper.select: select TRUNC(avg(W_DUEDATE - W_REGDATE)) from waybill where N_START = #{s} and N_END = #{e}
mapper.insert: insert into parcel values ((select max(p_num)+1 from parcel), (select max(w_num) from waybill), (select n_name from node where n_num = #{node}), '상', 'n')
mapper.select: select p_num from parcel where w_num = (select max(w_num) from waybill)
mapper.insert: insert into DELIVERESTIMATION values ((select max(ds_num)+1 from DELIVERESTIMATION), #{id}, (select * from (select e_num from emp where n_num = #{node} order by RANKAVERAGE desc) where rownum = 1), to_date(SYSDATE,'RR/MM/DD'),'상')
